programme.title: NHL Hockey Minnesota Wild at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.sub-title: Minnesota Wild at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.desc: The Pacific Division champion Golden Knights take on the Wild in Game 1 of a Western Conference first-round playoff series. Minnesota finished fourth in the Central. Vegas has won five straight meetings, three this season by a combined 12-4 score.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Minnesota Wild at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.sub-title: Minnesota Wild at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.desc: The Golden Knights and Wild collide for Game 2 of their Western Conference first-round series in Sin City. Vegas outlasted Minnesota 4-2 to deal the first blow in Game 1. Brett Howden (VGK) and Matt Boldy (MIN) both scored a pair of goals.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Vegas Golden Knights at Minnesota Wild
programme.sub-title: Vegas Golden Knights at Minnesota Wild
programme.desc: The scene shifts to the Gopher State for Game 3 of a West quarterfinal between Vegas and Minnesota. The Wild knotted the series up with a 5-2 result in Game 2. Wild teammates Kirill Kaprizov and Matt Boldy have combined for nine points in two games.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Vegas Golden Knights at Minnesota Wild
programme.sub-title: Vegas Golden Knights at Minnesota Wild
programme.desc: Kirill Kaprizov's Wild host the Golden Knights for Game 4 of a Western Conference first-round set. Minnesota seized a 2-1 series lead with a second straight 5-2 victory. Kaprizov scored twice in each triumph, and boasts seven points in the series.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Minnesota Wild at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.sub-title: Minnesota Wild at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.desc: The Wild and Golden Knights return to Sin City for Game 5 of their deadlocked West quarterfinal. Ivan Barbashev scored 17:26 into overtime in Game 4 to give Vegas a 4-3 win and reset the series. Barbashev was held pointless in the first three games.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Vegas Golden Knights at Minnesota Wild
programme.sub-title: Vegas Golden Knights at Minnesota Wild
programme.desc: The Golden Knights face the Wild in Game 6 of their West first-round set. Brett Howden's goal 4:05 into overtime gave Vegas a 3-2 victory in Game 5 against Minnesota, and a 3-2 series lead. Howden beat former Knight Marc-Andre Fleury for the winner.

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
programme.sub-title: 2024-2025: Washington Wizards at San Antonio Spurs

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
programme.sub-title: 2024-2025: Dallas Mavericks at Golden State Warriors

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
programme.desc: Anthony Edwards hit a go-ahead 7-foot floater with 25.7 seconds left, and Rudy Gobert iced the game with two free throws to lead the Timberwolves past the Nuggets, 119-116. From Nov. 1, 2024.
